items.title: It’s time to face the truth: American consumers have been gloomy for quite some time
items.description: One day, we have swagger. The next day, we’re cautious. Then we’re thrifty again.

items.title: After my father died, my stepsister transferred assets into her name. Do I have any legal recourse?
items.description: “Since my dad died, I’ve been able to get just one box of personal mementos and some family possessions.”

items.title: The worst decade ever for government bonds, just got worse again.
items.description: Bond markets across the world remain under pressure,.

items.title: ‘She helped put me in the position I am in now’: Packers rookie Matthew Golden surprises his grandmother with a new Houston house
items.description: Green Bay Packers rookie Matthew Golden has revealed that he achieved his lifelong goal of buying his grandmother a home.

items.title: ‘Her kids will have no inheritance’: Will my friend lose her house to Medicaid if she goes into a nursing home?
items.description: “She would like to leave her kids something after she dies.”
